text: Lekin haiwān ko giriftār kiyā gayā. Us ke sāth us jhūṭe nabī ko bhī giriftār kiyā gayā jis ne haiwān kī ḳhātir mojizānā nishān dikhāe the. In mojizoṅ ke wasīle se us ne un ko fareb diyā thā jinheṅ haiwān kā nishān mil gayā thā aur jo us ke mujassame ko sijdā karte the. Donoṅ ko jaltī huī gandhak kī sholāḳhez jhīl meṅ phaiṅkā gayā.
